400.title: Invalid Request
400.message: The request contains invalid data. Please check your input and try again.

401.title: Authentication Required
401.message: You need to be authenticated to access this resource.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource was not found.

422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.message: The request data is valid but cannot be processed.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have exceeded the rate limit. Please try again later.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

upload.file_too_large: File size exceeds the maximum limit of {max_size}MB.
upload.invalid_format: Unsupported file format. Please use MP4, AVI, MOV, or other supported formats.
upload.upload_failed: File upload failed. Please try again.
upload.no_file: No file was provided for upload.

processing.task_failed: Video processing failed. Please try again.
processing.invalid_url: Invalid video URL. Please provide a valid YouTube, Vimeo, or TikTok URL.
processing.download_failed: Failed to download video from the provided URL.
processing.transcription_failed: Audio transcription failed. The audio quality might be too low.

validation.url_invalid_protocol: URL must start with http:// or https://
